blocks.subject: Re: EOL GTC Confirms
text: Melissa
Attached is the suggested template for physical power confirmations as
discussed.
As you know the "Confirmation Letter" is defined in the GTCs as being in the
form attached as Exhibit A to the GTCs, any changes to the confirmation that
the counterparties can expect to receive should also be reflected on the
Website in Exhibit A.
Kind regards,
Marcus

blocks.subject: EOL GTC Confirms
text: Hello, I wanted to make sure I understand where the new language is to be
inserted in our EOL GTC confirmation letter.  Bob Bowen was telling me they
are putting the new paragraph at the beginning of the confirm letter.  The
only problem I see is that we have the trade date and the energy type (firm
energy, etc.) in the first paragraph as well.  We also already have language
in the last paragraph about returning the confirm to us within 2 days.
Please look at the following template and let me know where you would prefer
to see the language added.  We are planning on changing our templates
tomorrow morning.
Thanks,
Melissa
